name: Playground (M-Ansley)
description:
A minimalist social simulator.

This has been an intensely personal project to work on. That being said, I hope it says something for you personally. 

***

Please feel free to leave a comment or get in touch if you have any questions or feedback you'd like to share (I'm always up for a chat). Equally, if you'd like to find out more about this game or watch a commentary-free walkthrough instead, see https://marcusansley.com/2020/01/30/playground/. 

While this game doesn't really use fun as a desired aesthetic/play experience, I hope you enjoy it. 

~ M
